::: {.justify}

Psychologist. Master's degree in Anthropology from the Federal University of Mato Grosso (UFMT). Currently a doctoral candidate in Public Health at the same institution. Member of the Center for Anthropology and Plural Knowledges (NAPLUS/UFMT), the Junior Editorial Board of the Aceno Journal, the Schizoanalytic Laboratory for the Production of Subjectivities and Intersections (LEPSI), and the Center for Environmental Studies and Occupational Health (NEAST).

:::
